name: taskninja
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: task ninja
des:
This is a developer sample.

As a provider skill, Task Ninja supports a few custom tasks such as PlaySound, CountDown and CheckStatus.

As a requester skill, Task Ninja can also initiate Skill Connections to request other provider skills to perform custom tasks via CheckStatus.

Learn more about Skill Connections: https://developer.amazon.com/en-US/docs/alexa/custom-skills/understand-skill-connections.html
